query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS enrichment_runs (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  projectId INT NOT NULL,
  startedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  completedAt TIMESTAMP NULL,
  totalClients INT NOT NULL,
  processedClients INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  status ENUM('running', 'paused', 'completed', 'error') DEFAULT 'running' NOT NULL,
  durationSeconds INT NULL,
  errorMessage TEXT NULL,
  notifiedAt50 INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  notifiedAt75 INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  notifiedAt100 INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL
);

  status ENUM('running', 'paused', 'completed', 'error') DEFAULT 'running' NOT NULL,
  durationSeconds INT NULL,
  errorMessage TEXT NULL,

  notifiedAt100 INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL
